Thanks!

From: Thomas Gielow [mailto:tcgielow@demandsolutions.com] Sent: Monday, January 16, 2012 12:06 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: George Owens SOW
Sara, Please see attached.
Tom
From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] Sent: Friday, January 13, 2012 12:12 PM To: Thomas Gielow Cc: gocomputer_1465@yahoo.com; georgeowens@optonline.net Subject: RE: George Owens SOW Importance: High
Hello Thomas,
I just wanted to follow up on the paperwork. Please complete the attached SOW as soon as possible so we can finalize George’s account and get him paid for the work he has been doing.
Please feel free to contact me with any questions.
Thanks! ___________________________________
SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, January 12, 2012 1:08 PM To: 'tcgielow@demandsolutions.com' Cc: 'gocomputer_1465@yahoo.com'; georgeowens@optonline.net Subject: George Owens SOW Importance: High
Hello Thomas,
My name is Sara Conde and I work with George Owens at MBO Partners. We are looking finalize the paperwork on his engagement. Demand Solutions has already signed our MSA (attached.) All we need now is for you to complete the attached SOW and return via email or fax. Once that is done I will send you a fully executed copy for your records.
Please feel free to contact me with any questions.
Regards, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
